home.title: SaveYourGoblin
home.subtitle: Your AI-powered D&D 5e Content Generator
home.description: Generate characters, environments, and missions instantly when players go off-script

characters.title: Characters & NPCs
characters.description: Generate fully fleshed-out characters with names, backgrounds, skills, spells, and personality traits in seconds.
characters.example: "In this tavern there's a Bard..." becomes a complete character with history, voice lines, and mission hooks.

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: Create immersive locations with ambient details, mood, lighting, and interactive features that bring your world to life.
environments.example: Transform a simple description into a rich, atmospheric setting your players will remember.

missions.title: Missions & Quests
missions.description: Instantly generate quests with objectives, rewards, difficulty levels, and connections to your existing story.
missions.example: Turn unexpected player actions into engaging side quests that enhance your main campaign.

step1.title: Describe
step1.description: Simply describe the situation or what you need. No complex forms or templates required.

step2.title: Generate
step2.description: Our AI creates detailed, D&D 5e-compatible content tailored to your scenario.

step3.title: Save & Use
step3.description: Save your generated content and use it immediately in your campaign.

generator.title: RPG Content Generator
generator.description: Describe your scenario and generate content
generator.cardDescription: Describe the situation or what you want to create. For example: "In this tavern there's a Bard who talks about an ancient flute"

contentTypeDesc.character: Generate a character with background, skills, and personality
contentTypeDesc.environment: Create a location with atmosphere and details
contentTypeDesc.mission: Design a quest with objectives and rewards

generator.scenarioHelper: Be as detailed or as simple as you want. The AI will expand on your description.
generator.placeholderCharacter: Example: A mysterious Tiefling bard in a tavern who knows stories about an ancient magical flute
generator.placeholderEnvironment: Example: A dark, abandoned wizard's tower filled with magical traps, glowing crystals, and ancient spellbooks
generator.placeholderMission: Example: Retrieve a stolen magical artifact from a thieves' guild hideout before it falls into the wrong hands
generator.generationSuccessMessage: Your {contentType} has been created and is displayed below.

tips.tip1: Be specific about the setting and context
tips.tip2: Mention important details (race, class, mood, etc.)
tips.tip3: Include any special requirements or constraints
tips.tip4: The more context you provide, the better the results

example1.text: A mysterious Bard in a tavern talking about an ancient flute
example1.scenario: In this tavern there's a Bard and he will talk with the heroes about an ancient flute

example2.text: An elderly wizard shopkeeper with information about a lost spellbook
example2.scenario: An elderly Human wizard who runs a magic shop. They're friendly but forgetful, and they have information about a lost spellbook

example3.text: A suspicious Tiefling rogue watching from the shadows
example3.scenario: A suspicious Tiefling rogue in the shadows of the marketplace, watching the party with keen interest

example1.text: A dark wizard's tower with traps and artifacts
example1.scenario: A dark, abandoned wizard's tower filled with magical traps and ancient artifacts

example2.text: A bustling marketplace with merchants and spices
example2.scenario: A bustling marketplace in the city center. Merchants call out their wares, and the smell of spices fills the air

example3.text: An ancient forest clearing with glowing mushrooms
example3.scenario: An ancient forest clearing with glowing mushrooms and a mysterious stone circle

example1.text: Retrieve a stolen artifact from thieves' guild
example1.scenario: The heroes must retrieve a stolen magical artifact from a thieves' guild hideout

example2.text: Investigate disappearances in a village - werewolf suspected
example2.scenario: Investigate strange disappearances in a small village. The locals suspect a werewolf is responsible

example3.text: Escort a merchant caravan through dangerous mountains
example3.scenario: Escort a merchant caravan through dangerous mountain passes while protecting valuable cargo
